thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 9 of 3524
thread.title: LANISHA

author: LANISHA
title: LANISHA
text: I heard about thrift books from a friend after having way too many books on the top of my wish list. I always compare prices before I buy so I can get the most bang for my hard earned buck. Thriftbooks was, hands down, the best value. I ordered every book I was originally looking for and even filled up a new wishlist for my next order! I loved that there was an option for not only new books but also for used. I also love that it recommends other books you may like based on what you have already ordered or things on your wishlist. I'm so glad I found thriftbooks and will definitely keep using it!
